reporting-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

description.narrative: During this activity, we revised KAP baseline report. We also drafted year two workplans and budget. Other achievements included monitoring of RISE activities and working with consortium partner monitoring departments

participating-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

activity-date.narrative: Activity started on the planned start date

recipient-country.narrative: Funds for the implemented activities were received in Uganda

sector.narrative: 64.4% of the funds were spent to cater for family planning KAP baseline survey report revision and monitoring of RISE activities
